verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: signed] [ARG1: an executive order] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARGM-ADV: ending the process of separating children from families after they are detained crossing the U.S. border illegally] .
